short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Download videos from various websites. Note that downloading from YouTube and certain other websites is not permitted
short.de: Videos von verschiedenen Websites herunterladen. Das Herunterladen von YouTube und einigen anderen Websites ist nicht erlaubt
short.es: Descarga videos de muchos sitios web. No se permite descargar de YouTube y algunos otros sitios web
short.fr: Téléchargez des vidéos depuis de nombreux sites web. Il n'est pas autorisé de télécharger à partir de YouTube et certains autres…
short.nl: Download video's van verschillende websites. Het is niet toegestaan om te downloaden van Youtube en enkele andere websites.
short.ru: Загружайте видео с многих веб-сайтов. Загрузка с YouTube и некоторых других сайтов не разрешена.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Download videos from web sites using our Super Great Video Downloader and select between different resolutions if the site supports it.

Save videos playing on websites directly to your hard disk. Enjoy the convenience and flexibility of Super Great Video Downloader with just a few clicks.

Please note the following important information:
Due to restrictions imposed by the Chrome Store, we regret to inform you that the download functionality for YouTube, Instagram, Dailymotion, Vk, and Tiktok videos has been locked.
long.de,es,fr,nl,ru:
Download videos from web sites using our Easy Flash Video Downloader Pro and select between different resolutions if the site supports it.

Save videos playing on websites directly to your hard disk. Enjoy the convenience and flexibility of Easy Flash Video Downloader Pro with just a few clicks.

Please note the following important information:
Due to restrictions imposed by the Chrome Store, we regret to inform you that the download functionality for YouTube, Instagram, Dailymotion, Vk, and Tiktok videos has been locked.
